alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 1:53AM MST until March 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT MDT/ THIS EVENING TO NOON MST /1 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts from 45 to 55 mph. Localized gusts to 60 mph, mainly over higher terrain. * WHERE...The Flagstaff portion of the Mogollon Rim, the higher terrain of Yavapai County and western Coconino County and the Black Mesa. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight MDT/ this evening to noon MST /1 PM MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Coconino Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
